text: Alberto Nardin (born 30 April 1990) is an Italian former racing cyclist, who competed professionally for UCI Professional Continental team in 2015 and 2016. He began his professional cycling career in 2015 and made his debut at the Vuelta al Táchira. ==Major results== ;2011 : 8th Gran Premio San Giuseppe ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male cyclists Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Alberto Nardin
